name: space shooter (itch) (rollandd)
description:
this is my first game. pls test it and give me feedbacks <3

for the pc versione:

g=explosive_bullet

r=flash_up

f=flash_down

WARING: YOU HAVE TO REPRESS THE BUTTON THAT FIRES THE EXPLOSIVE BULLET IF YOU WANT TO MAKE IT EXPLODE

the sounds are form Keneey, and the backgroung, asteroids and player are from a book "godot engine game devolper"
